languages.text: "Сколько же вам было лет, когда вы впервые отняли жизнь? Вы же... еще девочка почти. Ужасно".
"How old were you when you first took a life? You are... scarcely more than a girl. Dreadful."
languages.original_text: "Сколько же вам было лет, когда вы впервые отняли жизнь? Вы же... еще девочка почти. Ужасно".

traits.locale_text: "How old are you? When did you first take a person's life? You are... barely a grown woman. This is dreadful."
"How old are you? When did you first take a person's life? You are... barely a grown woman. This is dreadful."
"How old are you? When did you first take a person's life? You are... barely a grown woman. This is dreadful."
"How old are you? When did you first take a person's life? You are... barely a grown woman. This is dreadful."
"How old were you when you first took a life? You are... scarcely more than a girl. Dreadful."
"How old were you when you first took a life? You are... scarcely more than a girl. Dreadful."
"How old were you when you first took a life? You are... scarcely more than a girl. Dreadful."

languages.text: "Wie alt wart Ihr, als Ihr das erste leben genommen habt? Ihr seid ... kaum mehr als ein Mädchen. Grauenhaft."
languages.original_text: "How old were you when you first took a life? You are... scarcely more than a girl. Dreadful."

traits.locale_text: "Wie alt seid Ihr? Wann habt Ihr zum ersten Mal jemanden getötet? Ihr seid ... kaum mehr als ein Mädchen. Grauenhaft."

languages.text: « Quel âge aviez-vous lorsque vous avez pris votre première vie ? Vous êtes encore une toute jeune fille... Quelle horreur. »
languages.original_text: "How old were you when you first took a life? You are... scarcely more than a girl. Dreadful."

traits.locale_text: « Quel âge avez-vous ? À quand remonte votre premier assassinat ? Vous êtes encore une toute jeune fille... Quelle horreur. »

languages.text: «¿Cuántos años tenía cuando se cobró por primera vez una vida? Es... apenas más que una niña. Qué horror».
languages.original_text: "How old were you when you first took a life? You are... scarcely more than a girl. Dreadful."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cuántos años tiene? ¿Cuándo se cobró por primera vez una vida? Es... apenas una niña. Qué horror».

languages.text: 「最初に人命を奪ったのは何歳の時ですか？まだ少女ではないか。恐ろしい」
languages.original_text: "How old were you when you first took a life? You are... scarcely more than a girl. Dreadful."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は何歳だ？最後に人の命を奪ったのはいつ？お前は…女の子なのかどうかも分からない。恐ろしい」

languages.text: “您第一次杀人是多大的时候？您……您明明还是个小姑娘，这太可怕了。”
languages.original_text: "How old were you when you first took a life? You are... scarcely more than a girl. Dreadful."

traits.locale_text: “你今年多大了？你第一次杀人是什么时候？你……你明明还是个小姑娘，这太可怕了。”

languages.original_text: "How old were you when you first took a life? You are... scarcely more than a girl. Dreadful."

languages.text: "İlk kez birinin canını aldığında kaç yaşındaydın? Daha... Gencecik bir kızsın. Çok korkunç."
languages.original_text: "How old were you when you first took a life? You are... scarcely more than a girl. Dreadful."
